summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 24
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Friday, with a total of 18 companies seeing their share prices decline.
Bitcoin fell 3.1% to $23,213 by market close.
